pp.battleship.bs
Class AbstractPlayer

java.lang.Object
  pp.battleship.bs.AbstractPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Human, KI, NetworkKI, NetworkPlayer
public abstract class AbstractPlayer
extends Object
implements IPlayer

Diese Klasse implementiert das IPlayer Interface. Es werden die meisten im Interface deklarierten Methoden genau definiert.

Author:
Thomas Aichinger, Matthias Bernloehr

public boolean sunk(Ship ship,
